channel.title: Blahgs on Brian Santero
channel.description: Recent content in Blahgs on Brian Santero

item.title: Brian's Shorts 01
item.description:
One of my favorite quotes: “Always practice as if your teacher is right outside the door.”

Luckily, I know he’s not. Therefore, I don’t.

item.title: Trials of a Trombonist
item.description:
Every day is about making yourself better, right? I should be Brian v1.9.9.2.3 and tomorrow I’ll be .4, then .5… I’ve considered this to be a falsism.

You hear it in many ways: “it’s about the journey”, “[deity] put me here for some reason”, “Bubba smash BUG!” No matter how you say it, we feel like we need purpose. I’m a classically trained orchestral musician in my life, but that hasn’t been my PURPOSE per se. Each day, I wake up and precisely don’t have a burning desire in my heart. Each day is another chance for me to figure out what I want in my life.

item.title: Hellow Orld
item.description:
Yet another Hello World for my blahg. I’ve lost track of how many blahgs I’ve started, but I swear, this one is the best!

No more Joomla, no more Wordpress. It’s a very cool technology called Jekyll. This tech allows me (and you!) to build each site, and launch it anywhere. I don’t need a super powerful server, and there’s no database for anyone to hack into. It’s just simple html, css, and js.

The magic is behind the curtain.
